title: Playing Card, 1937
description: Two packs of playing cards (-a,b) printed on cardboard in a box (-c) covered with red and blue flocked paper. -a: bears, on backs, three-quarter likeness of George VI in Coronation robes, with name printed below and conventional forms of rose, thistle, leek, and shamrock in blue; -b: bears, on backs, three-quarter likeness of Queen Elizabeth, in Coronation robes, with name below.
